Text:
I'm sorry I will be unable to seed from today through to 30th. Thank you so much everyone who has downloaded this, and thank you so much to those who are seeding this. You give me so much hope just knowing that you are interested. 
     Spread the word of truth, tell everyone, don't be afraid of being called crazy, that is their weapon for ignorance and submission. Find new ways to introduce facts into the lives of your friends and family. You owe it to them. Once again I thank you. I will be back in 1 week to seed.
